item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, August 30, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. JD Vance urges billionaire Peter Thiel to help bankroll Trump campaign
2. Harris pitches for centre in first big TV interview as candidate
3. Zelenskyy faces backlash over Russia’s breach of eastern defences
4. Italy weighs sharp tourist tax rise in furore over impact of visitors
5. Telegram’s financial future in doubt as chief faces criminal inquiry
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, August 30, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
